title: Ability to force speaker on Phone (or other devices) when headphones are plugged in
body: When using FM radio, i have my headphones plugged in.  If i have access to the FM radio APIs, i need the ability in my app to force audio to go through the speakers, not the headphones.

comments.body:
Why would you want to be able to output audio to the phone speakers instead of headset? That seems more like an unwanted user feature, having audio through speakers on the phone when no headset plugged is ok.
For desktop one should be able to choose output though, but not on phone/mobile.
Maybe I'm misunderstanding the request.
how can I have a radio party in d office if I cant play my favorite fm stations on a friday evening...?
Radio FM is very nice app but without loudspeaker (minus 10)
The same bug. FM Radio was very good &useful & easy app. other app are only for headphones. Now we don't develop this radio, we need only save this app into code, or store !!
This is needed to build VoIP application. Playing audio stream in loudspeaker is uncomfortable for users.
